main event: A detailed report of a UFO sighting in San Antonio, Texas on 6 October 1954. The UFO was described as round, initially like a ball of fire, then dividing into two brilliant white halves, traveling at a speed of 1500 mph.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for 12 - 14 seconds by a civilian source.
The sound was reported to be that of aircraft.
Another UFO sighting on 2 October 1954 in an area described as 'Bateball', with the object being pale blue and disappearing from vision during a vertical climb.
Air traffic in the area looked nothing like regular aircraft, indicating a potential anomaly.
There was no physical evidence or photographs of the UFO in the report.
sighted object: round UFO dividing into two brilliant white halves, traveling at 1500 mph
